section.name: About this Guide
section.p: The Plexus User Guide is intended to help developers get acquainted with Plexus by providing thorough descriptions and examples. If you have any suggestions or comments please feel free to post them to the Plexus users' list.

section.name: Component Integration
section.p: Creating an application with Plexus is primarily an exercise in component integration. You may create specialized components for your particular application but to a large extent you will assemble a set of existing components, with possible modifications, to create your application.
